title: I keep getting "Connection Error" whenever i try to login
body: Whenever I attempt to login I keep getting Connection error and it closes the login menu. Also, my internet is fine I've been playing Hots and diablo on it in the meanwhile.

replies.body: have you fix this yet? having same issues and nothing works
dude im having the same problem, did u find a fix?

it looks like a routing issue in the interwebs somewhere. If I enable WTFast I am able to connect just fine.  Also if I tether my computer to my tmobile phone I get in just fine. However when I use my normal ISP without WTFast enabled, can't connect to PVP.net and can;t launch the game

I have the same problem, since this tuesday, but I have this issue when I try to log in in NA server... I play in the LAN server with some friends there, and it works fine ... so weird and frustrating ...
